meanings.definition: To be present at an event or gathering.
meanings.sent1: I am attending the party tonight.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys attending concerts with her friends.
meanings.sent3: Attending family reunions always brings back fond memories.
meanings.sent4: The stars attending the award show shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: Attending the wedding made her heart swell with happiness.

meanings.definition: To pay attention to or focus on something.
meanings.sent1: He is attending to his homework diligently.
meanings.sent2: Attending to details is crucial in this job.
meanings.sent3: Attending to her cat's meows, she realized it was hungry.
meanings.sent4: The chef was attending to the simmering soup with care.
meanings.sent5: Attending to the patient's needs is the nurse's top priority.

meanings.definition: To accompany or go with someone.
meanings.sent1: I will be attending my friend to the airport tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Attending her on the journey, he ensured she was safe.
meanings.sent3: Attending him to the store, she picked out some snacks.
meanings.sent4: The loyal dog attended the child wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: Attending the explorer on his adventures, she documented everything.
